fullText: Frank Langella gives a devastating performance as a man losing his mind to dementia in Florian Zeller's harrowing play about the dissolution of memory and identity.
dtliExcerpt: Frank Langella gives a devastating performance as a man losing his mind to dementia in Florian Zeller's harrowing play about the dissolution of memory and identity.
